name: Mediterranean Honeysuckle
options: - 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Eau de Parfum Spray  - 3.4 oz/ 101 mL Eau de Parfum Spray - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL Eau de Parfum Spray
details: Fragrance Family: FloralsScent Type: Fruity FloralsKey Notes: Italian Bergamot- Honeysuckle- GrapefruitFragrance Description: This parfum is formulated with sweet honeysuckle and sparkling grapefruit evoking lush flowers and shimmering beaches. Italian bergamot- sun-warmed and citrusy- and mandarin oil impart lasting freshness. lily of the valley and lush gardenia build to the sensuality and richness of jasmine sambac absolute.About the Fragrance: "Escape to the sun-drenched- azure-blue Mediterranean. Mediterranean Honeysuckle takes you there- evoking lush flowers and shimmering beaches. Everywhere I travel in the Mediterranean there's a sense of timeless beauty and effortless style. It's a very magical place and a great source of inspiration in my life and my work."—Aerin
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

Fragrance Family:
 Floral

 Classic Floral

About:
 The rose is a timeless symbol of beauty and femininity. Like an original piece of art- Rose de Grasse is meticulously crafted with an artisanal attention to detail. At its heart is a fusion of roses including the hundred-petaled rose centifolia- hand-picked in Grasse—the French capital of perfumery since the 16th century where the history of fragrance is art.


What else you need to know:
"I've always been inspired by the timeless beauty of roses. Rose de Grasse represents the most rare and special of these flowers."—Aerin

name: Mini Aegea Blossom Eau de Parfum Travel Spray
details:
Fragrance Family: Fresh

Scent Type: Fresh Florals

Key Notes: Sicilian Bergamot- Neroli Petals- Musk

Fragrance Description: AERIN introduces Aegea Blossom- a luminous floral scent- that captures the sparkling vibrancy of a coastal paradise and a cool breeze on the open water. Notes of Sicilian bergamot paired with crisp mandarin and glistening verbena open the fragrance with a sophisticated- radiant glow that sparkles. Diffused with a breeze of sheer jasmine to impart a unique luminosity- scents of sun-drenched neroli petals and blooming orange flower glisten with a naturally fresh brilliance. In the final notes- glowing musk surrenders to the sultry- lingering notes of vetiver and sandalwood- as warm as the reflection of sunlight on water.

Like a bud opening- the heart of the fragrance unfolds to reveal the uninhibited splendor and depth of white Bulgarian rose- the rich- full-bodied rose bulgare- and lush rose centifolia. Together- they capture the irresistible spirit of the English garden rose blooming boldly in the sun. The trail is enhanced with the smooth warmth of sandalwood and amber and softened by musk.What else you need to know:"There’s something so natural and free about the fragrance of an English garden rose. The exhilarating scent comes from its strength as much as its beauty. It’s like a rush of energy."—Aerin Lauder

Its modern- effortless- and free-spirited scent captures the pure simplicity of a rose touched by the salty-cool ocean breezes- open to the sea- sand and sky.The energizing rush of sun-drenched top notes scatter like orange flower petals among lemon leaves to create a vivid burst of freshness. They flow through the enveloping warmth of the rose-filled heart of the fragrance: white Bulgarian rose- exotic ylang-ylang- refreshing coconut water- Bulgarian rose absolute- Bulgarian rose oil- and rose bouton. Sun-bleached vetiver adds the final modern note of depth and refinement.What else you need to know:"I love long walks on the beach. name: Pret-a-Powder Post Workout Dry Shampoo Mist
details: What it is: A quick drying- dual-phase liquid mist that is formulated specifically to clean and refresh sweaty strands.Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- Curly- and CoilyHair Texture: Fine- Medium- and ThickKey Benefits: - Cleanses and Refreshes Sweaty and Damp Hair- Eliminates Odors- Absorbs OilinessFormulation: Lightweight Spray Highlighted Ingredients:- White Bamboo Extract and Silica: Help absorb oil and refresh sweaty hair.- UV Filters: Help protect hair from the drying effects of the sun.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- phthalates- and mineral oil. This product is also cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know: This liquid- quick-drying- dual-phase mist is formulated to help cleanse and refresh sweaty hair- absorb oils- and eliminate odor in hair. It is perfect for all types of sweaty hair.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Shake super well. -Section damp or sweaty hair and apply two to four pumps about six inches away from roots. -Let sit for 15 to 30 seconds- then shake out with fingers or brush through to cleanse and refresh.Pro Tips: -Visible separation and settling is normal; shake well before using. -Use a towel to absorb excess sweat where hair’s damp from the workout—usually at the roots- in the nape- and behind the ears. -Shake and spray hair in sections. -After applying- tousle hair with hands- brush through- or towel-dry to distribute and get rid of moisture. -To dry hair quickly- blow-dry on cool.
ingredients: -White Bamboo Extract and Silica: Help absorb oil and refresh sweaty hair.-UV Filters: Help protect hair from the drying effects of the sun.Water\Aqua\Eau- Alcohol Denat.- Bambusa Arundinacea (Bamboo) Stem Extract- Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract- Glycerin- Isoamyl Laurate- Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane- Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate- Lithium Magnesium Sodium Silicate- Hydrated Silica- Calcium Chloride- Cetrimonium Chloride- BHT- Butylene Glycol- Pentylene Glycol- Fragrance (Parfum)- Hexyl Cinnamal- Linalool- Limonene- Citronellol- Geraniol- Coumarin- Citral- Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

name: Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Heat & UV Protective Primer
details: What it is: A frizz-fighting leave-in treatment that detangles- protects- and conditions dry- coarse- or brittle hair- and helps to provide moisture and UV and heat protection.Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- and CurlyHair Texture: Medium and ThickHair Concerns: Straightening and Smoothing- Heat Protection- and Color SafeFormulation: LiquidHighlighted Ingredients:- Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil- Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil- and Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil: Condition- soften- and add shine. - UV Filters: Help protect hair against the drying effects of the sun. This product is also cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know:  This top-selling leave-in treatment is blended with six featherlight oils to help soften- silken- tame- defrizz- detangle- and protect against breakage. Plus- it contains UV protection to help shield hair from the drying effects of the sun. It works well with dry- damaged- and/or color-treated hair.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-On day one- spray on damp hair- rake through- and style.  -On day two (and so on)- apply to dry hair to refresh and re-style. 
Pro tips:
-Fine hair: To control application- spray onto hands and apply from mid-lengths to ends. 
-Medium-to-thick hair: Spray all over- from roots to ends—or wherever hair is most dry. 
-To use as a leave-in treatment- spray onto wet hair and then slick back into your fave style. 
-Spray onto hair after a dip in the pool or ocean- to moisturize- detangle- and protect hair against UV rays. 
-Honestly? You can’t use too much. Apply until your strands feel soft and smooth.

- Twist-up crayon for root touch-up or color accents

 Brownish Hair Powder adds sexy volume- boosts texture- absorbs excess oil- delivers a dry- matte finish- and extends the life of styles with stay-put hold. Its oil-free formula works to refresh allover color- blend in the look of new hair growth- and enhance natural shades without the white residue of most dry shampoos. Chocolate- mahogany- and chestnut shades of brunette hair look fuller- cleaner- and refreshed. 
What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates
What else you need to know:
Before shampoo as we know it- powder was historically used to absorb excess oil- add volume- and create a dry- matte finish. Bb.Session Stylist Laurent Philippon brings this tradition to modern-day styles with aerosol styling powders in five- lavish shades.   Bumble and bumble is a cruelty-free brand- meaning they don't test on animals. Bb. products are free from parabens- phthalates- mineral oils- and formaldehyde.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake well and hold 10 to 12 inches from the scalp- misting through layers of the hair with light- even strokes. 
-Let dry and work out any excess with fingertips or brush through.
-Style as usual.
 Precautions:
-Be sure to protect clothing- bath- and bed linens during use (spots can be easily removed with a mild soap and water). 
-Flammable—contents under pressure.
-Avoid spraying near eyes. 
-Do not store or use near fire or sources of heat.
-Protect from sunlight and do not expose to temperatures above 120 degrees Fahrenheit or 50 degrees Celsius.
-Do not pierce or burn- even after use. 
-Do not spray on naked flame or any incandescent material.
-Keep out of reach of children.
-Use only as directed.
-Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal.

name: Color Minded Shampoo
details: What it is:An ultra-mild- sulfate-free shampoo that protects color integrity- prevents color fading- and helps to eliminate color washout.What it is formulated to do:This invigorating shampoo helps prevent color fading and washout while keeping tones true. By locking color in and locking water out- you can keep hues as rich as the day of your service. Color Minded seals in shine and smooths the cuticle to make hair color glow- fights the horrid humidity- and adds healthy-looking luster and luminosity—just like a finishing coat.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: Formulated with a new- proprietary two-polymer technology that covalently binds to and cross-links over color-treated hair- it works to resurface the process-damaged cuticle and seal the hair to prevent color washout and fading. The color process opens the cuticle to deposit color into the hair shaft. If the cuticle is not sealed properly- water can enter and wash away new color as soon as the first shampoo (which is when the most color washout happens).Bumble and bumble is a cruelty-free brand- meaning they don't test on animals. Bb. products are free from parabens- phthalates- mineral oils- and formaldehyde.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage-Wet hair- lather and rinse thoroughly.-To seal color and add shine- follow with Color Minded Conditioner.

name: Surf Spray
details:

- Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract: A natural seaweed extract with a high iodine and mineral content; contributes shine and manageability to hair and reduces the harshness of some chemicals; the nutritive value of this extract makes it ideal for skin preparations.

This spray also works well with healthy- moderately coarse hair.

For a windswept look- use your fingers to style and blow dry.

 Precautions:-Flammable. 
-Aerosol.

-Keep out of reach of children.

-After cleansing with Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Shampoo- use one or more quarter-sized amounts- depending on moisture needs.-Work between your hands and then apply from mid-lengths to ends.
-Leave on for a minute or two. -Rinse thoroughly.
Don't Blow It (Fine):
-After hair is towel dried- work a quarter-sized amount from mid-lengths to ends. Use more for more enhanced texture.
-Twist and squeeze hair
-Leave hair in twists while drying
-Once dry- shake out hair with hands

name: Bb. Glow Bond-Building Styler
details:
What it is: A smoothing styler that deeply repairs hair- builds bonds to protect against future damage- and provides light hold.
Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- Curly- and Coily
Hair Texture: Fine- Medium- and Thick
Hair Benefits: Heat Protection- Hold- and Straightening/Smoothing
Formulation: Heavy Cream
Highlighted Ingredients:- Honey Protective Complex: Helps condition while improving hair’s elasticity to prevent breakage; the complex is made with sustainably-harvested honey. 
- Glow Bond-Building Technology: Penetrates into cortex and builds bonds- which hold hair together (these bonds are often broken by chemical processing or heat-styling). 
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- formaldehydes- phthalates- and mineral oil. This product is also cruelty-free.
What Else You Need to Know:  Bb. Glow Bond-Building Styler protects against heat damage- builds bonds to fortify hair fibers (instantly and over time- with repeat use)- and helps prevent breakage. Plus- it leaves behind a healthy glow. Infused with bond-building technology and honey protective complex- it is designed for all types of damaged hair including heat- chemical- or color.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-First- mist Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil UV/Heat Protective Primer onto damp hair. 
-Apply Glow Bond-Building Styler all over- rake through hair- and blow-dry. 
-Or- apply to damp hair before air-drying.  
Pro tips:
-For more hold- use Thickening Spray all over hair before heat-styling. 
-For more volume- use Surf Foam Spray Blow dry at the roots before heat-styling. 
-Finish with Does It All Hairspray for light hold and a bit shine.

name: Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Balm-to-Oil Pre Shampoo Masque
details:
Which hair type is it good for?
✔ Straight
✔ Wavy
✔ Curly
✔ Coiled
✔ Tightly Coiled
What it is:
 A hair oil from an award-winning line that softens- de-frizzes- detangles- protects- and hydrates dry strands.
Key benefits:
- Combats frizz
- Boosts shine
- Hydrates
If you want to know more…
The Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Balm-to-Oil Pre Shampoo Masque is a highly concentrated balm that transforms to oil to hydrate the hair at its driest points. The luxurious formula’s six signature oils include argan- coconut- macadamia nut- sweet almond- safflower seed- and grapeseed oils. A sustainable palm oil blend- sourced from Honduras and Brazil- gives it a transformation from a solid to a lavish oil when warmed. This innovative hair mask creates silky- soft- and ultra-manageable hair with a silicone-free formula that locks in moisture to deliver healthy-looking shine- softness- and manageability.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates
What else you need to know:
 This product is formulated without silicones and alcohol. The award-winning Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil family is famed for pampering parched strands- thanks to a blend of six signature- featherlight oils.
Bumble and bumble is a cruelty-free brand- meaning they don't test on animals. Bb. products are free from parabens- phthalates- mineral oils- and formaldehyde.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to dry hair once weekly before shampooing to give parched strands a much-needed dose of hydration—dry hair absorbs more than wet hair. 
-To coat the hair- scoop out enough to thoroughly saturate strands- then warm the product between the palms to melt.
-Distribute throughout dry hair- section by section- and let it sit for 20 minutes.
-For best results- follow with Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner (each sold separately).
 Precautions:
-This product may liquefy in heat.
-Store in a cool- dark place.

details:

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Due to the rich pigment level that enhances this flawless-coverage makeup- shades may appear deeper when first applied. Once blended completely and allowed to dry- Beyond Perfecting Makeup will melt into your skin for a Beyond Perfected flawless look. -A little goes a long way. Using the large backside of the wand- sweep foundation across your forehead- cheeks- and chin.
-Then use the angled tip of the applicator—it has a slight dip in it to hold more product—to cover down the bridge of the nose and across the jawline. Blend well with fingers.-Finish by using the pointy tip to spot conceal any trouble :  the eyes- around the outside of the nose- on top of blemishes. -Pat and blend well with fingers.

name: Clinique iD™ Custom-Blend Hydrator Collection
details: What it is:  A revolutionary- custom-blend hydrator that gives you the power to hydrate your way.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture- Fine Lines and Wrinkles- and Dark SpotsFormulation: Lightweight GelIngredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know:  This collection allows for the custom hydration. Begin by picking your hydration base- add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done; there are up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. How do I know if this tint works with my skin tone? Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide to see if BB-gel is a good fit for you. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sunkissed look. Clinique does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones. Apply BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation. A little goes a long way.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.-For best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.

details: What it is:  A topical treatment for breakouts with results as good as a leading prescription that starts working instantly. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply a thin layer to entire face twice a day after cleansing. Precautions:-Spot-apply if you are using another leave-on acne treatment.-Using other topical acne drugs at the same time or right after use of this product may increase dryness or irritation of skin. If this occurs- only one medication should be used unless directed by a doctor.-If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs- reduce usage to every other day.

-Sweep on after makeup application.
-Invert powder canister and tap gently to allow powder to gather in tray.

-For the most flawless look- use Clinique's Powder Rubdown technique: Pour powder into palm of hand- coat fingertips with powder- and then gently pat and smooth fingertips over skin. Brush off excess.

name: Pretty Easy Liquid Eyelining Pen
details:
What it is: 
A 24-hour wear- eyeliner pen that delivers a precise- dramatic line.
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and synthetic fragrances. What Else You Need to Know:Clinique’s mistake-proof pen creates a clean line in one steady sweep. The precision brush easily draws on intense color—from thin to thick—for your day-to-night look. This product is ophthalmologist-tested. It is safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-To create a thin line- use the pointed tip of the brush. -To create a thick line- use the flat side of the brush. To create a tight line: -While looking into a mirror- tilt head back 10°- making it easier to see the lash line. -Starting at outer corner of eye- draw a line to the middle of the lash line. -Repeat from inner corner of the eye- connecting to the first line. To create a cat eye: -Start with the tight line as directed above. -Create the perfect diagonal line for your eye shape by drawing a short thin line upward towards the outer corner of your eyebrow.

name: Clinique iD™:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Pores & Uneven Texture
details: What it is:  A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Pores and Uneven Texture that addresses skin concerns.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Pores- Dullness- and Uneven Texture  Formulation: Lightweight LotionHighlighted Ingredients:- Alpha Hydroxy Acids: Cleans away dead skin cells and rough patches to reveal fresher-- smoother-- and brighter-looking skin.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know: This fragrance-free collection allows for customized hydration that’s suitable for a range of skin tones with up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. Begin by picking your hydration base- then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. Follow these tips to see if the tint will work with your skin tone: Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE do not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Cleansed- exfoliated skin accepts moisture better- so for best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or only where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.-Apply the BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation—a little goes a long way. Pump just once onto fingertips. -Ensure encapsulated color pigments bloom by rubbing between fingertips.How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.

name: Clinique iD™:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Uneven Skin Tone
details: What it is:  A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Pores and Uneven Texture that addresses skin concerns. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns:  Dullness- Uneven Texture- and Dark Spots Formulation: Lightweight LotionHighlighted Ingredients:- Japanese Angelica Root: Helps encourage a more even-looking skin tone.- Ascorbyl Glucoside: Helps reduce the appearance of discoloration.- Salicylic Acid: Helps create fresher-- smoother-- and brighter-looking skin.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know: This fragrance-free collection allows for customized hydration that’s suitable for a range of skin tones with up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. Begin by picking your hydration base- then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. Follow these tips to see if the tint will work with your skin tone: Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Cleansed- exfoliated skin accepts moisture better- so for best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or only where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.-Apply the BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation—a little goes a long way. Pump just once onto fingertips. -Ensure encapsulated color pigments bloom by rubbing between fingertips.How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.
ingredients: -Japanese Angelica Root: Helps encourage a more even skin tone.-Ascorbyl Glucoside: Helps reduce the appearance of discoloration.-Salicylic Acid: Helps create fresher-- smoother-- and brighter-looking skin. name: Clinique iD™:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Irritation
details: What it is:  A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Irritation that addresses skin concerns your way. Begin by picking your hydration base- then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.

details:

-Deepest shade can be applied as a liner along lash lines using the applicator tip.

-Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.

 A luscious- long-wearing powder eyeshadow. 

What it does:
This creamy shadow glides on in one smooth stroke for long-wearing color- and is formulated to be crease and fade resistant. It is available in soft matte- soft shimmer- or super shimmer finish. Matte finish shadows give fine lines and wrinkles a softer- smoother look. A hint of soft shimmer shadow dabbed into the center of lids adds a pop of brightness. Super shimmer shadows act as highlighting shades to bring out browbones and inner corners of eyes. Try light shades for a more dramatic effect on deeper skintones or dark shades for a more natural look. Dark shades look more dramatic on fairer skins; light ones look more natural.

- Parabens

All About Shadow Singles are ophthalmologist tested- and appropriate for contact lens wearers or those with sensitive eyes. The mirrored compact comes with a sponge-tip applicator.

-For a more detailed application- choose specialists from Clinique's Makeup Brush Collection.
-Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.

Complexions with very fair to pink undertones- use Shade 01. Very fair- moderately fair- and golden undertones- use Shade 02. Moderately fair to medium complexions with golden undertones- use Shade 03. Golden to deeper skin tones- use Shade 04.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: High Impact Lash Elevating Mascara
details:
What it is:
An uplifting mascara that gives lashes weightless volume with all-day hold. 

What it does:
 Formulated with lash-conditioning mamey seed oil- this gentle- long-wearing mascara is infused with curling polymer to bring lashes to new heights that lasts all day. This lightweight- mousse-like formula will not clump or flake- and is smudge-resistant. It’s also ophthalmologist tested so even sensitive eyes look bigger- brighter- and boosted.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 This product is ophthalmologist tested- allergy tested- and 100 percent free of fragrance. It’s also free of formaldehyde- formaldehyde resin- toluene- DBP (dibutyl phthalate)- and camphor. It’s safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers- and it works on all lash types. Sweat- and humidity-resistant- it’s formulated with lash-conditioning mamey seed oil.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Start at the base of lashes and wiggle brush up to the tip of lashes.-Repeat to build.-To apply to lower lashes- hold wand vertically.-Do not pump brush in container- this adds air that can dry out the mascara.-To prevent clumping- let mascara dry between coats.Long-wearing formulas like this have a lot of staying power. Here are two ways to remove it: Use Take The Day Off™ Cleansing Balm (sold separately):-Scoop out a coin-size amount with dry hands. -Close your eyes and massage balm over lashes and eye area. -Apply warm water and massage for about 10 seconds. This gives the balm time to break down tenacious- long-wearing makeup. -Rinse well with warm water and pat dry. -Follow with a dry cotton pad to remove any residual product.Use Take The Day Off™ Makeup Remover For Lids- Lashes & Lips (sold separately):-Saturate a cotton pad with remover- and gently press it over your eyes for about 10 seconds. This gives the remover time to break down tenacious- long-wearing makeup so you can sweep it away. -Swipe a cotton pad under the eyes to remove any residual product. -Follow with a gentle face cleanser.

name: Fresh Pressed Clinical™ Daily + Overnight Boosters with Pure Vitamin C 10% + A (Retinol)
details:
What it is: A fresh- potent day-and-night de-aging booster system that delivers results equal to a leading prescription for lines and wrinkles.
Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles- Dullness and Uneven Texture- and Dark Spots
Formulation: Lightweight Serum
Highlighted Ingredients:
- Vitamin C 10%: Works on skin's surface to instantly brighten for even-toned and retexturized skin with continued use. 
- Vitamin A (Retinol): Penetrates skin's surface for visibly improved fine lines and wrinkles and revitalized skin.
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- phthalates- and fragrance.
What Else You Need to Know:  Breakthrough boosters turn your moisturizer into a de-aging powerhouse. While using Vitamin A (Retinol)- you may see a little dryness- redness- or peeling- all signs it’s working. Use a daily moisturizer- a gentle- sulfate-free cleanser- and wear sunscreen daily (skin may be more photosensitive). Night Boosters with pure Vitamins C 10% and A (Retinol) are freshly activated to deliver prescription-level results against visible wrinkles.* Simply mix a few pumps with your favorite Clinique moisturizer—Vitamin C in the morning- Vitamin A at night. Enjoy a potent de-aging boost without changing the moisturizer you love.
Every day- Vitamin C 10% works on skin's surface to instantly brighten. See remarkably even-toned and retexturized skin with continued use. 
Every night- Vitamin A (Retinol) penetrates deeply into skin's surface. Over time- skin appears revitalized- lines and wrinkles 're-filled-' youthful tone recaptured.
1+1 system contains: 
- 0.28 oz/ 8.5 mL Vitamin C 
- 0.23 oz/ 7 mL Vitamin A 
2+2 system contains: 
- 2 x 0.28 oz/ 8.5 mL Vitamin C 
- 2 x 0.23 oz/ 7 mL Vitamin A
Clinical Results: Based on a 12-week clinical study using Vitamin C 10% in AM and Vitamin A (Retinol) in PM- vs. nighttime use of a leading prescription ingredient:
- Radiance instantly boosted after 1 AM use
- In 1 week- smoothness and texture improved
- In 4 weeks- fine facial wrinkles visibly reduced
- In 12 weeks- skin tone is more even and deep-set wrinkles and forehead lines dramatically reduced
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:To activate:
-Leave cap on. Remove foil. 
-Firmly press inner bulb two times to release Vitamin into the de-aging soothing emulsion.
-Shake 15 seconds. 
To use: 
-Shake before use. Remove cap.
-Press bulb two to three times to dispense into palm of hand.
-Mix in hand with a dollop of your moisturizer. Smooth all over face. Daily sunscreen is imperative.

A top-selling lip pencil- now in a pigment-rich- creamy formula.

-Re-cap securely to protect formula.

Which one to use depends on your skin. There’s a Superprimer for redness- dullness- discoloration- and sallowness. If you have more than one skin concern- we recommend using a Superprimer to address one issue and a foundation to address the other.

name: Sheet Masks
details: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ SensitiveWhat it is:A collection of sheet masks to provide targeted benefits to the face- eye- and neck. Solutions for:- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinkles- Loss of firmness and elasticityIf you want to know more… From brightening to purifying to fighting blemishes- these targeted sheet masks from Dr. Jart+ are each made with fine cellulose fiber to help deliver maximum targeted actives to the skin- delivering optimum results. Each mask also creates a cooling sensation to calm skin and applies acupressure to support natural circulation. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This product is free from 10 harmful ingredients such as artificial fragrance or color- denatured alcohol- triethanolamine- sulfate-based surfactants- triclosan- mineral oil- propylene glycol- and DEA that causes skin irritation. It’s suited for all skin types- including sensitive skin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Sheet masks:-Remove film and apply mask over cleansed face. -Leave on for 15 to 30 minutes then remove gently. -Do not rinse. -Massage remaining serum into skin and follow up with moisturizer. Pore Master Patch:-Apply dry patch to wet nose. -Let dry for 10 minutes- and then gently remove to extract blackheads. -Apply moist patch to nose immediately and remove it after 10 minutes. -Gently massage remaining serum into nose to help tighten and tone.Dermask Spot Jet Neck & Chin Lift™:-Remove film and apply mask over cleansed face. -Apply top portion and bottom portion. -For bottom portion- hook the left hole on the left ear and gently stretch the mask across the lower face following the contours of the face to hook on the right hole on the right ear- then smooth the bottom section over your neck. -Leave on for 30 minutes. Then remove gently and follow up with moisturizer.
ingredients:
-Aquaxyl: Derived from plant glucose; replenishes and protects vital moisture in your skin.
-Xylitol: Hydrates and strengthens skin barrier by preventing water loss.
-Oligo-hyaluronic Acid: Supports long-lasting moisturization.
-Algae Extract: Supports natural collagen synthesis.

The formula features Tiger Grass (Centella Asiatica) to help heal sensitive skin exhibiting inflammation- irritation or discomfort.The Cicapair™ Collection is inspired by the true legend of Asian tigers- rolling in centella asiatica to heal their battle wounds. For generations- this active ingredient has also been recognized as a recovery system to help support wounded skin exhibiting inflammation- redness- or blemishes.This product is free from 10 harmful ingredients such as artificial fragrance or color- denatured alcohol- triethanolamine- sulfate-based surfactants- triclosan- mineral oil- propylene glycol- and DEA that causes skin irritation.

name: Shake & Shot™ Rubber Masks
details:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A set of fun- DIY rubbery modeling masks that infuse skin with potent actives to smooth for a healthy- dewy-looking complexion.

Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Loss of firmness and elasticity
- Dullness and uneven texture

If you want to know more…
Dr.Jart uses the same "rubber mask" technique found in high-end Korean spas to achieve equivalent high-performance results—without the fuss of mixing a traditional modeling pack. The innovative cream-to-sheet formula penetrates skin more deeply than a sheet mask to deliver high-potency active ingredients. Each freshly-made mask penetrates skin surface to deliver the benefits your skin needs most quickly and effectively. 

This collection contains:
(Each sold separately)

Shake & Shot Rubber Hydro Mask: Moisturizes and revitalizes the complexion. The Hydro Mask ampoule contains a cocktail of Vitamin B5 (panthenol) and Expert Moist Complex- rich in amino acids- to help strengthen skin’s moisture barrier. Just shake it up and give skin a hydrating shot.
Shake & Shot Rubber Soothing Mask: Calms and repairs the complexion. The Soothing Mask ampoule contains Vitamin K3 (menadione) and a soothing botanical complex to calm irritated skin. Just shake it up and give sensitive skin a soothing shot.
Shake & Shot Rubber Brightening Mask: Brightens dull skin. The Brightening Mask ampoule contains Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) and sea buckthorn fruit extract- rich in vitamins- to even out skin tone- brighten darkness and revitalize skin. Just shake it up and give skin a brightening shot.
Shake & Shot Rubber Firming Mask: Improves skin elasticity and firmness. The Firming Mask ampoule contains Vitamin A (retinol) and OxyForce™ Cellular Active to help boost collagen synthesis and enhance elasticity and firmness of sagging skin. Just shake it up and give skin a firming shot.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 As the leader in high-performing skincare innovations- Dr.Jart+ created a shaking rubber mask to bring its fans the latest trend in masking. Plus- it’s easy and fun to use—just shake it up and give skin a shot.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Open and remove the spatula from the lid. -Combine both STEP 01 Super Booster and STEP 02 Liquid Ampoule in the cup. -Close the lid- cover the hole with your ﬁnger- and shake well until fully mixed. -Using the spatula- apply an even layer over entire face within two to three minutes (avoiding the eyes and mouth). -Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes. -Starting from the edges- gently peel off the mask. -Remove any excess with a damp cotton cloth or pad.-Follow with your skincare routine.  Precautions:-Product must be applied within two to three minutes after mixing.
ingredients:
-Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid): Brightens the look of skin tone and texture.
-Sea Buckthorn Fruit Extract: Is rich in vitamins to help provide an antioxidant effect and brighten skin tone.
-Grapefruit Extract: Smooths- energizes- and revitalizes dull and dark skin.

name: Focuspot™ Micro Tip™ Patches
details:
What it is: A set of self-dissolving micro tips that melt deep into the skin surface to target stubborn blemishes- dark spots- dark circles- and fines lines and wrinkles.   
Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Acne and Blemishes- Dark Spots/Circles- and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Highlighted Ingredients:
- Hyaluronic Acid 65% and Vitamin B3 (Focuspot™ Blemish): Prevent pigmentation and help to reduce breakouts.
- Hyaluronic Acid 65% and Vitamin C (Focuspot™ Dark Spot): Fade dark spots and give antioxidant benefit to skin.
- Hyaluronic Acid 72% and Vitamin A (Focuspot™ Dark Circle): Help to improve microcirculation underneath skin and reduce dark circles.
- Hyaluronic Acid 63% and Vitamin E (Focuspot™ Line & Wrinkle): Improve skin elasticity. 
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- mineral oil- and triclosan.
What Else You Need to Know:  Inspired by micro-needling procedures- Focuspot’s innovative adhesive patches contain small micro tips made of hyaluronic acid that melt in contact with the skin. As they self-dissolve- they deliver actives deep into the skin surface to target and treat stubborn concerns—without the pain and recovery like similar in-office procedures. In just two hours- hydrating hyaluronic acid and nourishing vitamins work to help visibly improve the look of blemishes- dark spots- dark circles- and fines lines and wrinkles- both instantly and long-term. These are 100 percent safe and clinically proven for visible results within two weeks.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Open the pouch and carefully remove patch from tray. Remove the white film.  Do not touch the center of the patch.
-Hold the edges of the patch and place its center on the desired area.
-Press the patch straight down to firmly adhere to skin. The combination of pressure and warmth from the skin triggers the melting effect. 
-A minimum application of two hours is recommended for each use. For the most effective results- use every other day.
-Expert tip: For maximum effectiveness- apply before sleeping and remove in the morning. 
Apply on dry skin before or after your skincare routine.

The Dermask Water Jet Vital Hydra Solution™ is made with fine cellulose fiber to help active ingredients penetrate deeply for ultimate hydration. name: Ceramidin™ Liquid
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ SensitiveWhat it is:A lightweight moisturizing toner that leaves skin supple- moisturized- and ready to absorb the next products in your regimen.Solutions for:- Dryness- Loss of firmness and elasticityIf you want to know more…This toner is now supercharged with 5-cera complex which leaves skin supple and moisturized. It also features panthenol- a calming complex of fig- centella asiatica- and phyto extracts which relieves cracked or flaky skin. This toner is for those who have dry- flaky- and rough-textured skin.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:Ceramides are our skin’s natural protection barrier. They are composed of intercellular lipids that act as skin’s defense against environmental aggressors and maintain moisture levels. Think of your skin as a brick wall: when it is first built- it is strong and sturdy. Over time- it needs fortification to remain strong. As we age- we lose ceramides- leading to a decrease in elasticity and moisture. 
This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-After cleansing- apply an ample amount with hands and gently pat into skin.

name: Focuspot™ Blemish Micro Tip™ Patch
details:
What it is: A set of self-dissolving micro tips that melt deep into the skin surface to target and clear blemishes—without needles common to similar procedures.
Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Acne and Blemishes
Formulation: Mask
Highlighted Ingredients:- 65% Hyaluronic Acid Micro Tips infused with Vitamin B3 and Peptides: Melt into skin within two hours to target and visibly clear stubborn blemishes and breakouts.            
- Vitamin B3: Helps prevents pigmentation and reduce breakouts and blemishes.		
- Polypeptide: Oligopeptide-76 helps moisturize skin and improve the look of acne-prone skin or areas of concern. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- mineral oil- triclosan- petrolatum- synthetic dyes- BHT- DEA- and fluorescent material.		
What Else You Need to Know: Replicating the effect of popular micro-needling procedures- 65 percent hydrating hyaluronic acid micro tips infused with nourishing vitamin B3 and peptides are absorbed deep into skin to moisturize and improve the look of breakouts and blemishes within two weeks. No recovery- painless- and 100 percent safe.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Open the pouch and carefully remove patch from tray. Remove the white film.  Do not touch the center of the patch.
-Hold the edges of the patch and place its center on the desired area.
-Press the patch straight down to firmly adhere to skin. The combination of pressure and warmth from the skin triggers the melting effect. 
-A minimum application of two hours is recommended for each use. For the most effective results- use every other day.
-Expert tip: For maximum effectiveness- apply before sleeping and remove in the morning. 
Apply on dry skin before or after your skincare routine.
ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate- Trehalose- Clitoria Ternatea Flower Extract- Niacinamide- Oligopeptide-76- Water- Curcumin- Maltodextrin.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Open and remove the spatula from the lid. -Combine both STEP 01 Super Booster and STEP 02 Liquid Ampoule in the cup. Close the lid- cover the hole with your ﬁnger- and shake well until fully mixed. -Using the spatula- apply an even layer over entire face within two to three minutes (avoiding the eyes and mouth). -Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes. Starting from the edges- gently peel off the mask. -Remove any excess with a damp cotton cloth or pad. Follow with your skincare routine.Precautions:-Product must be applied within two to three minutes after mixing STEP 01 and STEP 02.

name: Focuspot™ Dark Spot Micro Tip™ Patch
details:
What it is: A set of self-dissolving micro tips that melt deep into the skin surface to target and fade dark spots—without painful needles common to similar procedures.
Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots
Formulation: Mask
Highlighted Ingredients:- Micro Tip Melting Effect: Dried hyaluronic acid tips infused with vitamin A and peptides melt into skin within two hours to target and reduce stubborn dark spots.- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and rejuvenates the skin for a more youthful appearance.
- Vitamin C: Helps brighten skin and reduce the look of dark spots and discoloration.  Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- mineral oil- triclosan- petrolatum- synthetic dyes- BHT- DEA- and fluorescent material.		
What Else You Need to Know: Replicating the effect of popular micro-needling procedures- 65 percent hydrating hyaluronic acid micro tips infused with nourishing vitamin C are absorbed deep into skin to moisturize and improve the look of stubborn dark spots within two weeks. No recovery- painless- and 100 percent safe.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Open the pouch and carefully remove patch from tray. Remove the white film.  Do not touch the center of the patch.
-Hold the edges of the patch and place its center on the desired area.
-Press the patch straight down to firmly adhere to skin. The combination of pressure and warmth from the skin triggers the melting effect. 
-A minimum application of two hours is recommended for each use. For the most effective results- use every other day.
-Expert tip: For maximum effectiveness- apply before sleeping and remove in the morning. 
Apply on dry skin before or after your skincare routine.
ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate- Trehalose- Clitoria Ternatea Flower Extract- Ascorbyl Glucoside- Niacinamide- Water- Maltodextrin- Adenosine.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply STEP 01 Peeling Essence on a clean face- avoiding the eye area.-Apply STEP 02 pH Balancing Mask after gently massaging face with the sugar grains.-Bubbles will start to form and the sheet will begin to change color.-Leave the mask on for three to five minutes. -Rinse off with tepid water and apply your skin care products. -For a better exfoliating effect- wipe the skin with the mask before rinsing off with water  Precautions:-You may feel tingling in the skin as carbonic acid bubbles pop and remove the dead skin cells. There is nothing to worry about. However- if your skin becomes irritated- please stop using the product.

name: Focuspot™ Dark Circle Micro Tip™ Patch
details:
What it is: A set of self-dissolving micro tips that melt deep into the skin surface to target and reduce dark circles—without painful needles common to similar procedures. 
Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Dark Circles
Formulation: Mask
Highlighted Ingredients:- Micro Tip Melting Effect: Dried hyaluronic acid tips infused with vitamin A and peptides melt into skin within two hours to target and reduce stubborn dark circles.- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and rejuvenates the skin for a more youthful appearance.
- Vitamin A: Helps promote microcirculation to improve the look of dark circles.
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- mineral oil- triclosan- petrolatum- synthetic dyes- BHT- DEA- and fluorescent material.				
What Else You Need to Know: Replicating the effect of popular micro-needling procedures- 72 percent hydrating hyaluronic acid micro tips infused with nourishing vitamin A and peptides are absorbed into skin to moisturize and improve the look of stubborn dark circles  within two weeks. No recovery- painless- and 100 percent safe.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Open the pouch and carefully remove patch from tray. Remove the white film.  Do not touch the center of the patch.
-Hold the edges of the patch and place its center on the desired area.
-Press the patch straight down to firmly adhere to skin. The combination of pressure and warmth from the skin triggers the melting effect. 
-A minimum application of two hours is recommended for each use. For the most effective results- use every other day.
-Expert tip: For maximum effectiveness- apply before sleeping and remove in the morning. 
Apply on dry skin before or after your skincare routine.

details: What it is: A multiuse powder that can be worn as foundation- or over it- with customizable coverage- long wear- and an oil-controlling matte finish.Coverage: Medium  Finish: Matte  Formulation: Pressed powder Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily What Else You Need to Know: Use this one powder in a multitude of ways. The perfectly-matte- oil-controlling finish stays color-true.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage: How To Determine Your Undertone: Undertone is the way your bare skin looks and behaves. Which one sounds most like you?-Cool (C) undertones: Bare skin has a rosy tone- and burns easily in the sun.-Neutral (N) undertones: Bare skin is more even-toned- not too pink or golden.-Warm (W) undertones: Bare skin has a golden or olive tone- and tans easily in the sun.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-To start- choose a concealer shade that matches your foundation or is one shade lighter.-For best results- Estée Lauder recommends applying concealer after applying your foundation.-Use Double Wear Concealer with Concealer Brush 5 (sold separately). -Swipe concealer onto the back of your hand- then with the brush smooth on over the desired area. -Blend well.Targeted Concealing Techniques: -For darkness around eyes- go with a slightly lighter shade than your foundation. -For puffiness- slightly darker. -For uneven skintone- wear the same exact shade as your foundation.

name: Micro Essence Skin Activating Treatment Lotion
details: What it is:  A concentrated lotion that helps hydrate and stabilize skin’s foundation.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Pores- Dryness- and Dullness and Uneven TextureFormulation:  Lotion Ingredient Callouts: This product contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Choose a concealer shade that matches your foundation or is one shade lighter. -For best results- apply concealer after applying your foundation. -Conceal- contour- and highlight large areas using the flat angled edge of applicator.-For concealing targeted areas or dark circles- use the precision tip.-Blend out with a concealer brush.Find your perfect shade: Choose your skin’s intensity level (from ultra-light to very deep) and undertone (cool- neutral- or warm).How To Determine Your Undertone:-Undertone is the way your bare skin looks and behaves. Which one sounds most like you?-Cool (C) undertones: Bare skin has a rosy tone and burns easily in the sun.-Neutral (N) undertones: Bare skin is more even-toned- not too pink or golden.-Warm (W) undertones: Bare skin has a golden or olive tone and tans easily in the sun.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Apply with a cotton pad or with your hands.
With a cotton pad: 
-Gently glide saturated cotton pad over face- from the center out. -Start at chin and move upwards to cheeks and forehead. -Do not apply pressure during application.
With your hands: 
-Pour five to six drops of Micro Essence in hand and rub hands together. -Gently press the Micro Essence into skin from the center out. -Start at chin and move upwards to cheeks and forehead.
-Rub hands together to warm- and then gently wrap face using warm hands to complete application.

name: Glow Essentials Mask + Moisture Set
details:
What it is:  A travel-friendly set of five bestselling mask treatments and a highlighting moisturizer- to multi-mask on the go for sexy glowing skin anywhere.

Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily 

Skincare Concerns: Pores- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinkles

Formulation:  Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Charcoal: Detoxifies and refines the look of pores.
- Witch Hazel: Tones.
- Super Six Acid Blend: Refines the look of pores.

 Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates. 
What Else You Need to Know: Glow on the go with these travel-friendly tubes! Whether you need to clear- firm- hydrate- detoxify- or brighten- GLAMGLOW® has the perfect mask for any and every day in this new kit.
SUPERMUD® visibly draws out impurities and GRAVITYMUD™ gives skin a firm and lifted feeling. To combat dry skin- THIRSTYMUD™ comes to the rescue! Need to detox? POWERMUD™ will provide a deep cleanse and FLASHMUD™ can brighten for younger-looking skin. Finally- finish with GLOWSTARTER™ for a rush of radiance! Use multiple masks at a time to cover all of your skin concerns at once.
This Set Contains:
- 0.7 oz/ 20 g SUPERMUD Activated Charcoal Treatment
- 0.35 oz/ 10 g THIRSTYMUD Hydrating Treatment
- 0.35 oz/ 10 g GRAVITYMUDFirming Treatment
- 0.35 oz/ FLASHMUD Brightening Treatment
- 0.35 oz/ 10 g POWERMUD Dualcleanse Treatment
- 0.5 oz/ 15 g GLOWSTARTER™ Mega Illuminating Moisturizer

Clinical Results: Based on consumer trials on SUPERMUD- after 1 day of use: 
- 94% felt their skin looked renewed 
- 94% felt it gently cleared their skin 
- 91% saw an improvement in skin clarity 

On day 7 after using it 3 times in a week: 
- 98% felt their skin looked renewed 
- 97% saw an improvement in skin clarity 
- 97% felt it gently cleared their skin
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:SUPERMUD®:-Apply a thin layer to clean skin. -Leave on for five- 10- 15- or 20 minutes. -Pore-Matrix™ will reveal dots of vacuum extractions. -Remove with water. -Use as often as needed. -Use as a full mask or spot treatment. GRAVITYMUD™: -Apply a generous- even layer to clean skin with brush- avoiding eyebrows and hairline. -Leave on for 20 to 30 minutes. -Treatment will change color as it dries. Once it’s completely dry- gently peel off from edges. -Rinse off excess with warm water. -Use twice a week. -Clean brush after use with soap and water and air dry. THIRSTYMUD™: -Use two to three times per week or when needed. -Apply an even layer to clean- dry skin. -Can be used on the face- neck- and chest. -Daytime use: leave on for 10 to 20 minutes- allowing product to absorb into the skin. Wipe off with tissue and massage remaining product into skin or rinse with water. -Nighttime use: leave on to infuse the skin with moisture and wake up with extremely hydrated skin. -In-flight use: apply at beginning of the flight and leave on for flight duration. POWERMUD ™-Apply an even thin layer to a clean- dry face. -Leave on five to 10 minutes- allowing to dry. -For removal- apply water and use circular motions to transform into a Cleansing Oil Treatment. -Use once or twice a week.FLASHMUD™: -Apply to dry face in circular motions to pre-exfoliate for improved ingredient absorption. -Leave on for 20 minutes. -Product will turn semi-transparent as ingredients absorb. -Wash off with water. -Use three days in a row for improved results. -Thereafter- use two to three times per week to maintain results. GLOWSTARTER™-Apply evenly to face for an allover glow.-Wear alone or layer with your favorite foundation for a little extra glow.-Can also be used on the neck and décolleté.Precautions:-Avoid direct contact with eyes. If product touches eye- rinse with water. -For external use only. SUPERMUD:-This product may increase sun photosensitivity. -Not for use on open skin. -If in doubt- consult a physician before use. FLASHMUD: -Must use high-SPF sunscreen daily to protect and maintain results. -Results will be lost during extended and/or direct/unprotected sun/sunbed exposure.

details: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ DryWhat it is: A mud-based- peel-off face mask designed to tighten the appearance of skin. The skin’s contours are given a defined and radiant look. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:GRAVITYMUD is now offered in a 50 g jar—which is 25 percent more for the same price. how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply a generous- even layer to clean skin with fingers or a brush- avoiding the eyebrows and hairline. 
-Leave on and relax for 20 to 30 minutes. 
-The treatment will change color from white to chrome as it dries.
-Once it’s completely dried- gently peel off from the edges of the face. 
-Rinse off any excess with warm water. 
-Use twice a week for best results.
-As a pro tip- use the mask as a pre-makeup treatment for visibly firm and toned skin.  
 Precautions:
-Avoid the eye area.

name: YOUTHMUD® Glow Stimulating & Exfoliating Treatment Mask
details: What it is:  A skin-transforming clay mud mask that intensely exfoliates for softer- smoother- and more glowing skin in as little as ten minutes.Skin Type: Normal- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness- Uneven Texture- and Fine Lines and WrinklesFormulation: MaskHighlighted Ingredients:- Volcanic Rock: Multi-level surface exfoliator buffs away dead skin cell buildup- smooths uneven skin texture- and softens the look of fine lines.  - Natural Clay Blend: Gently absorbs impurities and excess oils.   - TEAOXI® Green Tea Leaf: Infuses mud with antioxidants from whole tea leaves.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- phthalates- and mineral oil. This product is also vegan and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know:  Reboot your glow with the mask that started a masking revolution. YOUTHMUD® exfoliates with volcanic pumice rock to help smooth the appearance of fine lines and visibly soften skin’s texture- while natural clays lift impurities without disturbing skin’s essential oils. Antioxidants from green tea leaves brighten and smooth for visibly firmer- more glowing- youthful-looking skin instantly.Founder Blurb: Co-founders Shannon and Glenn Dellimore were enjoying a casual evening with friends in the Hollywood Hills when an actor friend asked if anyone knew of a product that made skin instantly camera-ready. The verdict was unanimous: other than time-consuming facials that took weeks (even months)- nothing gave instant glowing results. With willing celebrities as test subjects- they set out to create a solution. After researching- they found a small- family-owned lab to make the formula- filled it in plain-white sample jars at home and hand-delivered it. Wowed by the results- word spread fast in Hollywood. Top entertainment executives- A-list actors- musicians- and celebrity makeup artists all called requesting the "no-name magic mud." Within a year- it was used all over Hollywood. Knowing they had made something that made skin glow and everyone feel glamorous- GLAMGLOW® and YOUTHMUD® were born.Clinical Results:  In a consumer study- after 1 day:- 97% agreed skin looked and felt smoother - 91% reported brighter skin- 94% experienced gentle surface exfoliation
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply a thin- even layer to clean- dry skin.-Leave on up to ten minutes. -Product will tingle (that means it's working). -Remove with water in circular motions to exfoliate. -Use twice a week or as desired. -Follow with a moisturizer.  Precautions:-Avoid the eye area. -Not recommended for use on extremely dry- reactive or sensitive skin. -Discontinue use if irritation persists.

name: Waterburst™ Hydrated Glow Moisturizer
details:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Combination
✔ Dry

What it is:

A weightless water cream for up to 72 hours of continuous hydration. 

Solutions for:
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
 This weightless water cream is developed with moisture-lock technology that immediately bursts into skin-quenching water drops on contact for hydration you can see and feel. It delivers up to 72 hours of continuous hydration. Featuring a triple Hyaluronic Acid complex- the water cream forms a moisture reservoir for your skin for instant- long-lasting hydration.
 
WATERBURST™ features a cutting-edge triple Hyaluronic Acid complex with molecules powerful enough to absorb 1000x times their weight in water directly from the atmosphere. The blend features varying sizes of HA molecules for effective hydration. The formula also contains Blue Nymph Lily Extract TEAOXI®- a rare flower blended into the formula to help quench and replenish skin for a supple- hydrated glow.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 GLAMGLOW’s water has been sourced from the volcanic paradise of Jeju Island- a jewel in the South Sea of Korea- renowned for its unique ecosystem with a towering volcano- mineral-rich soil- and crystal blue waters. Pristine and refined- the sapphire seas surrounding the island flow through basaltic rocks formed from molten lava- purified when they crash onto on the white-sand shores.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply evenly to freshly cleansed face and neck every morning or night.

details:

✔ Oily

 A mud-based- peel-off face mask designed to tighten the appearance of skin.

- Loss of firmness and elasticity
If you want to know more…
 The GRAVITYMUD™ Firming Treatment is an innovative face mask that changes color from white to a brilliant chrome. The included mask application brush delivers an even coat to the face- which peels off the skin to visibly tighten and lift for a youthful-looking complexion. The skin’s contours are given a defined and radiant look. 
What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:GRAVITYMUD is now offered in a 50 g jar—which is 25 percent more for the same price.

In a consumer study on 151 people- with 2 times per week usage:
- 92% agreed skin felt firmer 
- 91% said skin looked tighter and toned
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply a generous- even layer to clean skin with fingers or a brush- avoiding the eyebrows and hairline. 
-Leave on and relax for 20 to 30 minutes. 
-The treatment will change color from white to chrome as it dries.
-Once it’s completely dried- gently peel off from the edges of the face. 
-Rinse off any excess with warm water. 
-Use twice a week for best results.
-As a pro tip- use the mask as a pre-makeup treatment for visibly firm and toned skin.  
 Precautions:
-Avoid the eye area.

details: What it is:  A skin-transforming clay mud mask that intensely exfoliates for softer- smoother- and more glowing skin in as little as ten minutes.Skin Type: Normal- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness- Uneven Texture- and Fine Lines and WrinklesFormulation: MaskHighlighted Ingredients:- Volcanic Rock: Multi-level surface exfoliator buffs away dead skin cell buildup- smooths uneven skin texture- and softens the look of fine lines.  - Natural Clay Blend: Gently absorbs impurities and excess oils.   - TEAOXI® Green Tea Leaf: Infuses mud with antioxidants from whole tea leaves.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- phthalates- and mineral oil. Antioxidants from green tea leaves brighten and smooth for visibly firmer- more glowing- youthful-looking skin instantly.Founder Blurb: Co-founders Shannon and Glenn Dellimore were enjoying a casual evening with friends in the Hollywood Hills when an actor friend asked if anyone knew of a product that made skin instantly camera-ready. The verdict was unanimous: other than time-consuming facials that took weeks (even months)- nothing gave instant glowing results. With willing celebrities as test subjects- they set out to create a solution. After researching- they found a small- family-owned lab to make the formula- filled it in plain-white sample jars at home and hand-delivered it. Wowed by the results- word spread fast in Hollywood. Top entertainment executives- A-list actors- musicians- and celebrity makeup artists all called requesting the "no-name magic mud." Within a year- it was used all over Hollywood. Knowing they had made something that made skin glow and everyone feel glamorous- GLAMGLOW® and YOUTHMUD® were born.Clinical Results:  In a consumer study- after 1 day:- 97% agreed skin looked and felt smoother - 91% reported brighter skin- 94% experienced gentle surface exfoliation

name: GLAMGLOW X MY LITTLE PONY #GLITTERMASK GRAVITYMUD™ Firming Treatment Mask
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry

What it is:A limited-edition #GLITTERMASK GRAVITYMUD™ Firming Treatment in three sparkly shades—in collaboration with HASBRO to bring you a MY LITTLE PONY #MagicAndMasking experience.  

Solutions for:- Pores- Loss of firmness and elasticity    

If you want to know more… How fabulous—serious skincare- now in glitter… with #PONYPOWER! This mask features all the benefits of the original GRAVITYMUD Firming Treatment- now in glitter to take it to the next level in shades inspired by the iconic ponies. This holographic sparkle treatment delivers mega-targeted ingredients like a TEAOXI® complex of licorice and marshmallow leaf that help make skin’s contours feel firmer and look more defined after just one shimmering use. Serious skincare can be fun.

Paint on the sparkly glitter mask- kick up your hooves- and relax while it dries. Once completely dry- peel it off to reveal a tighter- toned- and more lifted you. Don’t forget to take super sparkly glitter selfies in sparkly shades inspired by the ponies of Equestria:

- Princess Luna Black—the powerful princess and beauty icon

- Pinkie Pie Pink—the socialite and life of the party

- Twilight Sparkle Purple—the lovable perfectionist

What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates

What else you need to know:GLAMGLOW x MY LITTLE PONY® #GLITTERMASK GRAVITYMUD™ Firming Treatment in Pink Glitter won the 2018 Seventeen Beauty Award.Frequently asked consumer questions:

Will the glitter be left behind on my face?

For a perfect glitter effect and peel- allow mask to dry fully before removing. Be patient and take lots of selfies.



Will the glitter clog my pores?

No- the glitter will not clog your pores.

 

Will the glitter wash into the water cycle and harm animals/our water?

The mask peels off and is discarded in the trash. If any excess mask remains- wipe from face.



Will the glitter particles scratch my face?

The glitter particles are suspended in the gel formula and are comfortable to wear.



Why would you put glitter in skincare/what does it have to do with skincare?

GLAMGLOW believes that serious skincare can be fun. They have been innovating their #GRAVITYMUD Firming Treatment collection with color- therefore taking it to the next level with glitter!



What is your glitter made of? Is it plastic?

#GLITTERMASK is made with the same high-quality cosmetic-grade glitter used in facial makeup. It also peels off to be discarded in the trash (not rinsed off with water).

Research results:In a consumer test on 151 people after 2x weekly usage:

- 92% agreed that skin feels immediately firmer

- 90% agreed skin feels immediately tighter and more toned
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Stir before use if required. -Apply a generous- even layer to clean skin with brush- avoiding eyebrows and hairline. -Leave on for 20 to 30 minutes. -Once completely dry- gently peel off from edges. -Rinse off excess with warm water. -Use twice a week. -Clean brush after use with soap and water and air dry. Precautions:-Avoid the eye area.
ingredients:
-TEAOXI® Complex (Licorice and Marshmallow Leaf): Creates a firmer-looking complexion.  -Vizitight (Firming Matrix- Marine Algae Plasma- and Biodefine Polymers): Delivers tighter-looking skin.    
-Lunarlift: Tones and tightens the appearance of skin with soy isoflavone liposome red algae extract.    
-Cosmiplexion (Icelandic Kelp- Hyaluronic Acid- and Glacial Clay): Supports a youthful appearance.

name: The Not All Heroes Wear Capes Set
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔  Sensitive
What it is: A super set of cult-favorite skin savers- featuring two travel-size tubes GLAMGLOW’s superhero products: SUPERMUD® Clearing Treatment and SUPERCLEANSE™ Clearing Cream-to-Foam Cleanser.   
Solutions for:
- Pores   
- Acne and blemishes
- Oiliness   
If you want to know more… Not All Superheroes Wear Capes! SUPERMUD is a potent mud formula designed to visibly clear the complexion and support skin’s natural oil balance- while a proprietary blend of six acids (glycolic acid- salicylic acid- lactic acid- mandelic acid- pyruvic acid- and tartaric acid) works to help minimize pores and create clearer skin. Activated-X charcoal lifts away dirt and other skin congestions- resulting in a refined- healthy-looking complexion. SUPERCLEANSE is a creamy cleanser that transforms into a luxurious foam to blast away impurities and remove pore-clogging debris. The pore-refining triple charcoal complex contains three charcoals to detox skin- while botanical ingredients like TEAOXI® eucalyptus leaf- licorice root- and cumin seed purify. Skin-refining- powerful AHAs support natural cell turnover and renewal- while K17 and Mediterranean clays absorb oils to mattify skin and restore balance to your complexion. Skin is visibly improved after each cleanse- with a diminished appearance of pores and a refined texture and tone.   
This set contains:- 0.5 oz/15 g SUPERMUD Clearing Treatment- 0.5 oz/15 g SUPERCLEANSE Clearing Cream-to-Foam Cleanser
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage: SUPERMUD®:
-Apply a thin layer to clean skin. 
-Leave on for five- 10- 15- or 20 minutes. 
-Pore-Matrix™ technology will reveal dots of vacuum extractions. 
-Remove with water. 
-Use as often as needed. 
 SUPERCLEANSE™:
-Squeeze a generous amount into dry hands.
-Add warm water to create foaming lather.
-Massage evenly in circular motions.
-Rinse well and pat dry.
-Use daily as needed. 
 Precautions: SUPERMUD®:
-Keep away from eyes. 
-This product may increase sun photosensitivity. 
-Not for use on open skin. 
-External use only. 
-If in doubt- consult a physician before use.

The Estée Lauder Companies’ Breast Cancer Campaign unites and inspires people globally in The Campaign’s mission to create a breast cancer-free world. Founded in 1992 by the late Evelyn H. Lauder with the launch of the iconic Pink Ribbon- The Breast Cancer Campaign is The Estée Lauder Companies’ largest corporate philanthropic initiative and supported by our employees worldwide. The Breast Cancer Campaign has raised more than $79 million to support global research- education-n and medical services- with more than $65 million funding 260 medical research grants through the Breast Cancer Research Foundation® (BCRF). For more information on The Breast Cancer Campaign- visit ELCompanies.com/BreastCancerCampaign.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Apply bottom half first onto clean- dry face.
-Smooth outward from center of face to align.
-Apply top half and repeat.
-Leave on for 10 to 15 minutes.
-Remove mask and gently massage in any remaining liquid.
-Use once a week or as desired.

name: Wood Sage & Sea Salt/ Peony & Blush Suede Mini Set
details: What it is:A set containing two travel sprays in Wood Sage & Sea Salt and Peony & Blush Suede.Fragrance Description: Travel in style and discover new favorite scents from Jo Malone London with this duo that can be worn individually or combined for a unique fragrance expression.Escape the everyday along the windswept shore where white waves break and the air is fresh with sea salt and spray. Alive with the mineral scent of the rugged cliffs mingled with the woody earthiness of sage- this fragrance is lively- spirited- and totally joyful. The essence of charm- this scent captures exquisitely fragile peonies in voluptuous bloom. A flirtatious- juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine- rose- and gillyflower mingle with the sensuality of soft- blush suede for a luxurious and seductive trail.This set contains:- 2 x 0.3 oz/ 9 mL Sprays in Wood Sage & Sea Salt- Peony & Blush Suede From colognes and candles to bath and body care- each Jo Malone London product comes presented in their signature gift box and ribbon.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: Grapefruit Cologne
options: - 1 oz/ 30 mL  Spray  - 3.4 oz/ 100 mL  Spray
details: Fragrance Family FreshScent Type: Fresh Citrus & FruitsKey notes: Grapefruit- Rosemary- MossFragrance description: Uplift your mood with this refreshing fragrance inspired by the abundant grapefruit groves in coastal Spain. Rosemary- peppermint- and pimento add perfect piquancy to grapefruit's bright and sunny nature.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

options: - 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Cologne Spray - 3.4 oz/ 100 mL Cologne Spray
details: Fragrance Family: Warm & SpicyScent Type: Warm Woods Key Notes: Cardamom- Vetiver- VanillaFragrance Description: This deliciously sensual scent opens with a dash of cardamom and the freshness of grapefruit tea- ushering in the earthy depths of native vetiver. Precious vanilla bourbon- hand-picked from the orchid-sown jungle- warms and envelops. It creates a mood that is all-at-once bountiful- delectable- and golden.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

About the fragrance: Rich with precious ingredients- Cologne Intense fragrances are inspired by ritual and are crafted to ignite the senses with their opulent- sensual scents. Bronze Wood & Leather takes you on a journey into new and unexpected territory- deep into the woods as a misty day draws to a close. Escape the everyday- following the trail of warm- smoky and burnished woods- mingling into what Jo Malone London has christened ’bronze wood‘. This precious new composition captivates with its sultry scent enhanced by rich- intense notes of leather—the perfect combination for a deep- cocooning escape
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. 
-After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

 Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.
