name: Better Than Sex Waterproof Mascara Mini
details:
What it is:
A waterproof- intensely black- volumizing mascara with an hourglass-shaped brush that separates- coats- and curls each lash to voluptuous perfection.

What it does:
Now in a waterproof formula- Better Than Sex Waterproof mascara has a volumizing formula with added high-performance and water-resistant polymers for waterproof- sweat-proof- play-proof wear. The hourglass-shaped brush was designed with extra stiff bristles to maximize the performance of this carbon black- collagen-fueled formula. One coat and lashes are full and defined. Two coats and lashes are even more luscious- curled- and dramatic.Three coats and you’ve achieved your most intense- voluminous- waterproof lashes possible.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This mascara’s unique peptides swipe on the deepest- intense black color- while the porcelain flower extract moisturizes and conditions lashes. The hourglass-shaped brush unlocks its volumizing formula.

Research results:
In a consumer study of 32 people:
- 97% saw intense volume and length
- 94% said this mascara stays put all day
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Sweep on one coat for lashes that are full- defined- and stretched to unbelievable lengths. 
-Add two coats for lashes that look even more luscious- curled- and dramatic. 
-Brush on three coats to achieve the most voluminous- multidimensional lashes possible.
-Use Mascara Melt Off Cleansing Oil (sold separately) to remove at the end of the day.

Better Than Sex Mascara- Too Faced’s bestselling mascara formula- curls- thickens- and lengthens the look of lashes in as little as one coat for the most luscious- dramatic- volumized lash looks possible.This set contains:- The Chocolate Bar Eyeshadow Palette- 0.015 oz/ 0.44 mL Sketch Marker Liquid Art Eyeliner in Black- 0.17 oz/ 5.02 mL Travel Size Better Than Sex MascaraWhat it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens

details: What it is: A mini weightless- three-in-one coconut water-infused mist that primes- sets- and refreshes makeup while it helps keep skin hydrated.What it does: This super hydrating- multitasking mist can be used as a primer before makeup- a setting spray to keep makeup in place all day- and a mid-day refresher anytime your skin needs a boost- serving as the perfect cure for a beauty hangover. Its unique blend of coconut water- probiotic-based ingredients- and skin revivers work together to hydrate and brighten skin- promote skin’s elasticity and tone- while smoothing skin. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates

✔ Glides on buildable- saturated color
✔ Delivers a matte finish
✔ Features an ombré layout for easy transitions
✔ Smells like peaches and cream

- Step-by-step how-to glamour guide

This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: Add glowing warmth to your complexion for dimension that works on any skin tone. name: Born This Way Turn Up the Light Highlighting Palette
details: What it is: A three-finish- complexion-enhancing highlighting palette.Highlighted Ingredients: - Coconut Water: Helps support skin’s moisture levels. - Alpine Rose: Helps nurture skin. - Hyaluronic Acid: Gives a smoother- more youthful appearance. Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know: This baked trio diffuses and refracts light for a perfectly lit complexion anywhere you go. The three finishes allow you to create your perfect level of glow- the buildable formula allows for controlled shimmer intensity- and the soft and silky pressed powder formula allows for easy pickup and payoff.This Palette Contains:- 2 x 0.05 oz/ 1.5 g Highlighters in Glow- Dazzle - 0.17 oz/ 5 g Highlighter in Soft Focus
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Swipe highlighters onto the high points of the face or use to set foundation with a radiant finish to give you a custom glow so natural- they’ll think you were Born This Way.Soft focus: -This is the largest pan in the center of the palette. Use it on larger planes of the face or set foundation where you'd like a gentle blur and brightened effect like the triangle of light beneath the eyes. Glow: -Apply as a traditional highlighter: lay it down on the skin to pull forward high planes of the face by enhancing the bone structure—like the cheekbone- bridge of the nose- under the brow bone- and the top of the chin. Dazzle: -Pinpoint where you want the brightest sparkle and dazzle with this ultra-sparkly shade. Too Faced loves to pop it on the top of the cheekbone- the center of the eyelid- the tip of the nose- and the cupid's bow.

name: Sweet Peach Papa Don’t Peach Blush
details:
What it is:
A brightening blush that's infused with a peach fragrance. 

What it does:
 Sweet Peach Papa Don't Peach Blush's sweet peachy-bronze hue imparts fresh- youthful-looking radiance to cheeks for a touch of summertime warmth. Infused with the essence of peach- this blush smells like peaches- and its rich- pigmented shade provides buildable payoff. Wearable and flattering on any skin tone- it leaves a gilded- pink-pearl- brightening finish.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 At a dinner in Paris- Too Faced Co-founder and Chief Creative Officer Jerrod Blandino had a culinary moment with a peach trifle dessert that featured peaches roasted on an open flame and caramelized. That rich bronzy peach color inspired him to bring back the iconic Papa Don’t Peach Blush from the Too Faced archives. He says it is the perfect natural blush with just enough warmth and a pop of luminosity that every woman can wear. 
This product is cruelty-free and free of gluten.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Add definition to the hollows of the cheeks with a matte bronzer. 
-Then pop on Papa Don’t Peach Blush on the apples of the cheeks for a warm- radiant finish.

name: Peach Mist Mattifying Setting Spray – Peaches and Cream Collection
details:
What it is:
 A refreshing- oil-controlling setting spray to keep makeup in place.


 What it does:
 Infused with exclusive comfort matte technology- this revitalizing formula provides two optical effects: a matte finish for decreased shine and a soft-focus to blur imperfections. Vigorously shake product for 3 seconds to evenly mix solution before applying.

✔ Features a comfortable- weightless feel

✔ Offers up to 12 hours of shine control 

✔ Lasts up to 16 hours

✔ Smells like peaches and sweet fig cream


What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates


What else you need to know:
For the first time in Too Faced history- they’ve created an entire line exclusively for Sephora. The Too Faced Peaches and Cream Comfort Matte Collection is infused with refreshing peaches and sweet fig milk—ingredients known for their hydrating and antioxidant-rich benefits—to help keep skin moisturized- comfortable- and beautifully matte.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Shake well. -Hold bottle six to eight inches away from face and mist directly onto skin. -Allow time to dry.

details:
What it is:
An eyeshadow palette with 18 shades in peachy pinks- corals- bronzes- and purples.

What it does:
The Sweet Peach Eyeshadow Collection Palette is infused with the juicy scent and antioxidant-rich essence of peach. Create endless looks with 18 shades of peachy pinks- corals- bronzes- and pops of purples that will leave your eyes looking warm weather-fresh all year long. It features a Glamour Guide with three eye looks to get you started.

This palette contains:

- Glamour Guide

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 This product is free of gluten.

name: Damn Girl! 24-Hour Mascara Mini
details: What it is: A high intensity mascara for shocking volume- dramatic lift and curl- and 24-hour wear—can you handle it? Highlighted Ingredients: - Whipped Melting Waxes: Melt into each other to create one weightless super-layer.- Lash Suspension Polymer: Lifts and locks-in curl.- Hydrophilic Black: Creates shamelessly-rich- black lashes. Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: Innovative polymers keep lashes flexible while lifting- lengthening- and locking in up to 24 hours of smudge-and-flake-resistant curl. This groundbreaking formula has been injected with air- and is already fully loaded. Do not pump.Clinical Results: In a consumer study of 104 women: - 97% said they saw full-on volume- 100% said they saw intense-back lashes- 99% said they saw long-wearing results
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Begin at the base of your lashes- and sweep the wand outward and upward from root to tip until your desired intensity is achieved. -Repeat with additional coats for even more extreme drama. Precautions:-This groundbreaking formula has been injected with air- and is already fully loaded. Do not pump.

details: What it is: A 16-shade eyeshadow palette inspired by the multifaceted beauty of real diamonds. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates.What Else You Need to Know: This captivating collection of 16 ultra-luxe shades features vivid glitters- creamy mattes- opulent shimmers- and precious pearls that can be layered in infinite ways to mimic the multifaceted beauty of diamonds. The four diamond-shaped- pressed-gel-glitter shadows allow for self-adhesion to minimize glitter fallout so your eyes stay dazzling with breathtaking intensity.This Palette Contains:- 16 x Eyeshadows in Diamonds 4 Breakfast (silver champagne glitter)- It's Designer (matte cream)- Fancy That (matte taupe)- Filthy Rich (silvered espresso)- Clutch Your Pearls (pink pearl shift)- Princess Cut (gilded pink with silver sparkle)- Highly Selective (rose glitter)- Diamond Glitterati (metallic dusty rose)- It's Cashmere- Dear (gold glitter)- Fluent in Diamonds (matte warm soft brown)- Don't Carat All (metallic warm gold)- Oh- That's Rich! (matte warm deep brown)- Coal Under Pressure (black with silver sparkle)- Silver Spoon (metallic charcoal)- Set the Jewel Tone (royal blue to purple shift)- Say It with Diamonds (holographic multi-sparkle glitter)
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Prep the eye from lash line to brow- and along lower lash line with Shadow Insurance Eyeshadow Primer (sold separately). -Use matte neutral shades from lightest to darkest to perfectly sculpt and create dimension on every skin tone. -Layer shimmery satin shades for bold highlights and color pops. -Press the gel-glitter with your finger or a dense flat brush in a stippling motion all over the eyelid to layer the richest glitter look with zero fallout. -Create gorgeous and easy looks by breaking down each row in flattering quads of complementary undertones.-For a touch of sparkle- use an eyeliner brush to apply the gel-glitter shadow to the lash line or inner corner of the eye. -The shade-shifting- shimmery white blends to a pink sheen and can be used to top and transform colors.

name: Mr. Right 5-Piece Eye Shadow Brush Set
details: What it is: A cruelty-free- five-piece brush collection for the face and eyes.What Else You Need to Know: This all-in-one- portable makeup brush set includes all the essential brushes you need to achieve any look you desire. Each brush is made with Too Faced’s luxuriously soft and silky Teddy Bear Hair.This Set Contains:- Large Shader Brush- Blender Brush- Small Shader Brush- Smudger Brush- Liner/Brow Brush
how_to_use: Suggested Usage: Large Shader Brush: -Soft yet firm- this is perfect for applying shadow all over lid.Blender Brush: -Fluffy- tapered- and perfect for smoking out shadow- especially in the crease.Small Shader Brush: -Use this small- dense brush to press on the perfect amount of shadow for maximum impact with precision and skill.Smudger Brush: -Use this soft- dense brush for smudging lash lines and corners.Liner/Brow Brush: -This thin- angled brush creates well-defined lines for flawless application of eyeliner and brow products.

details: What it is: A high-shine and high-sparkle lip gloss. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: Each twinkling shade of this dazzling gloss wraps your lips in luxurious dimension. The combination of light-reflecting glitters in this comfortable formula- enriched with natural oils- gives you a lip experience so rich and indulgent- you’ll feel like you’re dripping in diamonds.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply directly to lips with the doe-foot applicator.-Wear alone for an easy shimmer effect.-Layer as a topper over your favorite lip shade for ultimate color and sparkle.

name: Primed & Peachy Cooling Matte Perfecting Primer Mini – Peaches and Cream Collection
details: What it is: A travel-size Cooling Matte Perfecting Primer infused with peach and sweet fig cream.What it does: This long-lasting cooling matte primer is infused with refreshing peach and sweet fig cream. It blurs and smooths the look of your complexion with a brightening peach tint that works on any skin tone. Wear it alone or under foundation for mattifying- soft-focus finish that's lightweight- comfortable- and smells as good as it feels.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: For the first time in Too Faced history- they’ve created an entire line exclusively for Sephora. The Too Faced Peaches and Cream Comfort Matte Collection is infused with refreshing peaches and sweet fig cream—ingredients known for their hydrating and antioxidant-rich benefits—to help keep skin moisturized- comfortable- and beautifully matte.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply a small amount of primer to the forehead- nose- chin- and cheeks. -Blend product using your fingertips or a brush. -The peach color becomes invisible once fully blended.

name: Sweethearts Perfect Flush Blush
details:
What it is:
A trio-color blush packed into one pretty heart. 

What it does:

Three perfect swatches of ultraflattering blush allow you to either swirl the colors together and apply or use more of one shade for a custom flush or highlight. This blush was developed with easy application and a no-fail color palette to take the guesswork out of creating a sweet- romantic flush. With a baked color formula— the same technology that allows it to truly work on all skin tones—the blush can be applied as a beautiful buildable finish. 

What else you need to know:
This product is 100-percent cruelty free.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Sweep blush onto apples of cheeks for the perfect flush of color.

name: Lunar New Year Diamond Light Highlighter
details: What it is: A limited-edition Diamond Light Highlighter to celebrate the Year of the Rat.What it does: This multi-use diamond fire highlighter with light reflecting pearls is custom poured to ensure no two highlighters are ever the same. Each is infused with real crushed diamond powder and light-reflecting pearls for extra luxe sparkle. The formula is buildable for customized payoff.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: Each highlighter has a unique diamond fire finish- just like a real diamond in its truest form. Just swirl the shades together to unlock the multicolored effect and create dimension. The formula is lightweight- non-powdery- and easy to use. Create buildable- holographic looks on your lips- cheeks- and eyes- and turn any shade into a duo-tone with this multi-use product.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Swirl and sweep on top of cheek bones with Mr. Right Brush (sold separately).-Spray Hangover 3-in-1 (sold separately) all over face. Let dry- and apply Diamond Light on top for instant bling.-Shift your eye shadow by adding Diamond Light on top.-To achieve a diamond fire finish- use brush or fingers and swirl. Deposit one layer for subtle sheen- two layers for a strobing effect- or three layers for a blinding effect.

name: Chocolate Gold Eyeshadow Palette
details: What it is: A duochromatic matte and metallic eyeshadow palette that's infused with real gold and cocoa powder.What it does:Take decadence to the next level with this luxurious gold- and cocoa powder-infused eyeshadow palette that smells as good as it looks. The foiled shadows are created with real gold for an epic high shine finish. They’re paired with rich- seductive mattes to take you from coffee to cocktails. All shadows feature a soft- velvety texture with one-swipe- full-coverage payoff. The entire palette is also infused with skin-loving cocoa powder for a decadent chocolate scent.This set contains:- 14 x 0.03 oz/ 0.85 g Eyeshadows in Money Bags- Rich Girl- Cocoa Truffle- Decadent- Love & Cocoa- Old Money- New Money- Famous- Classy & Sassy- So Boujee- Holla For a Dolla- Gold Dipped- Livin' Lavish and Drippin' Diamonds- 2 x 0.07 oz/ 2 g Eyeshadows in Chocolate Gold- Rollin' in DoughWhat it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This eyeshadow palette is the perfect mix of metallic- foiled shadows and velvety- soft mattes. All of the shades are infused with Too Faced’s signature chocolate scent for a mood boost with every swipe. This product is cruelty-free.

name: Hangover To Go Set
details: What it is: A travel-size skin-replenishing set.What Else You Need to Know: Cure your beauty hangover with travel-friendly sizes of the entire iconic hangover collection. The Hangover Good In Bed Ultra-Replenishing Hydrating Serum is a replenishing- hydrating serum packed with ultra-nurturing ingredients. The Hangover Good To Go Skin Protecting SPF 25 Moisturizer is a daytime priming moisturizer that hydrates skin while providing sun protection. The Hangover Replenishing Face Primer is a replenishing face primer that hydrates- smooths- and brightens skin for a dewy- healthy-looking finish. The Hangover 3-in-1 Replenishing Primer and Setting Spray is a weightless- three-in-one coconut-water-infused mist that primes- sets- and refreshes makeup while it helps keep skin hydrated.This Set Contains:- 0.45 oz Hangover Good In Bed Ultra-Replenishing Hydrating Serum- 0.68 oz Hangover Good To Go Skin Protecting SPF 25 Moisturizer- 0.68 oz Hangover Replenishing Face Primer- 1 oz Hangover 3-in-1 Replenishing Primer and Setting Spray
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Hangover Good In Bed Ultra-Replenishing Hydrating Serum:Night:-Apply to clean skin and follow with moisturizer- if desired.Day:-Apply to clean skin and follow with Hangover Good To Go Skin Loving SPF 25 Moisturizer (sold separately).Hangover Good To Go Skin Protecting SPF 25 Moisturizer-Apply every morning- and prior to sun exposure- as the last step in your skincare routine.-Use two to three pumps applied directly to a clean face and neck after cleansing- avoiding eye area. Hangover 3-in-1 Replenishing Primer and Setting Spray: -Shake well. Hold bottle six to eight inches away from face and mist directly onto skin.-Prime: Apply to clean skin before makeup.-Set: Apply after makeup to keep it in place all day.-Refresh: This spray can also be used anytime to refresh skin.

details:
What it is: A deluxe-sized chocolate bar eye shadow palette in matte finishes.
What it does: The bestselling Chocolate Bar Eye Shadow Collection just got a matte makeover. Chocolate Chip Matte features 11 of Too Faced’s iconic Chocolate Bar shades transformed into all matte finishes- each infused with the signature antioxidant-rich cocoa powder and a decadent chocolate scent. With a confection of natural browns- delicate pinks- and luscious plums- the rich- high-pigment shadows offer true color payoff- while the silky-smooth formula blends effortlessly. The bite-sized palette is the perfect travel companion that allows you to indulge your beauty craving anywhere you go.

name: Mr. Chiseled Contour Brush
details: What it is: A contouring brush to shape the appearance of the face in seconds.Works with: Liquid- Cream- Gel- Pressed- and Loose Powder formulasBristle type:- SyntheticWhat Else You Need to Know: Introducing... Mr. Chiseled- the ideal contouring companion- makes it easy to lift cheekbones- look instantly slimmer- and effortlessly create perfect bone structure—without ever going to the gym.This brush works with liquid- cream- gel- pressed- and loose- powder formulas. It features synthetic bristles.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Pick up powder then sweep brush back and forth over the hollows of cheeks- jawline- and temples.
ingredients: unknown

name: Melted Matte-Tallic Liquified Metallic Matte Lipstick
details: What it is:A liquefied lipstick with a brushed-metal finish.What it does: Melted Matte-Tallic Liquified Metallic Matte Lipstick drenches lips in a rich- brushed-metal finish. The velvety matte formula delivers lightweight- comfortable- luxuriously plush wear and a dimensional- matte effect that’s never flat.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: The shade Magic Metal Transformer pairs perfectly with any other Melted Matte-Tallic shades. It features light-shifting- prismatic pearls and a pure crushed metal finish. (Each shade sold separately.)
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Use applicator tip to outline lips. -Use flat edge of applicator to fill in lips. -For a clean- precise application- apply foundation or concealer to the edges of lips after applying Melted Matte-Tallic.-For the shade Magic Metal Transformer: To unlock the brushed metal effect- apply and allow formula to dry down completely before rubbing lips together (each shade sold separately).
ingredients: Isododecane- Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate- Mica- Dicalcium Phosphate- Calcium Sodium Borosilicate- Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer- Disteardimonium Hectorite- Trimethylsiloxysilicate- Synthetic Fluorphlogopite- Tocopheryl Acetate- Ethyl Vanillin- Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate- Tin Oxide- Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)- Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090).

name: Primed & Poreless Face Powder
details: What it is: A mattifying- translucent pressed powder that helps visibly blur pores and refine skin texture while absorbing oil.Coverage: Light  Finish: Matte Formulation: Pressed Powder Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: This pressed powder visibly refines skin texture with a fresh- soft-focus effect for a nearly texture-free finish. It is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups and controlling shine or for wearing alone for a natural- filtered effect.Clinical Results: In a 1-week study of 100 women: - 90% said skin looked smootherIn an immediate study of 100 women: - 97% said skin felt softer- 95% said it instantly mattified shine- 94% said it gave skin a soft-focus finish
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Swirl Mr. Right Powder Brush (sold separately) lightly over Primed and Poreless Face Powder and blend evenly over skin. -Press into areas with larger pores for targeted blurring. -Can be worn on its own for a smoothing effect without any coverage; underneath powder foundations; or over powder foundations- liquid foundations- and bronzers. -Retouch throughout the day with the heart-shaped sponge to eliminate shine and reduce the look of pores on the go.
ingredients: Talc- Polymethylsilsesquioxane- Dimethicone- Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer- Silica- Magnesium Myristate- Mica- Polymethyl Methacrylate- HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer- Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate- Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate- Phenyl Trimethicone- Trimethylsiloxysilicate- Tocopheryl Acetate- Lauroyl Lysine- Lecithin- Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate- Dimethiconol- Glycerin- 1-2-Hexanediol- Water\Aqua\Eau- Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum- Caprylyl Glycol- Alcohol- Sclareolide- Fragrance (Parfum)- Limonene- Citral- Linalool.

name: Mr. Right Now Retractable Brush
details: What it is: A retractable powder brush.What Else You Need to Know: Introducing Mr. Right Now- a perfectly-portable version of the original Mr. Right Brush you fell in love with. Take this travel-ready version on-the-go to use with any and all powders. The luxurious- cruelty-free Teddy Bear Hair™ bristles grab pigments and blend them expertly for flawless application.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Twist up to expose the bristles.-Swirl or tap in powder- then stipple- dust- or brush the product onto the face- neck- or décolletage.
ingredients: unknown

name: Damn Girl, Those Lashes & Lips! Set
details: What it is: A set that Includes a travel-size Damn Girl! 24-Hour Mascara and Lip Injection Extreme Instant & Long Term Lip Plumper.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. These products are also cruelty-free and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: Damn Girl! Mascara is a high-intensity mascara for maximum drama and lift. Innovative polymers keep lashes flexible while lifting- lengthening- and locking in up to 24 hours of smudge- and flake-resistant curl. Lip Injection Extreme & Long Term Lip Plumper is a visible lip plumper for fast satisfaction and long-term results.This Set Contains:- 0.2 oz/ 6 mL Damn Girl! Mascara Mini- 0.1 oz/ 3 g Lip Injection Extreme Instant & Long Term Lip Plumper
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Damn Girl! Mascara: -Begin at the base of your lashes and sweep the wand outward and upward from root to tip until desired intensity is achieved. -Repeat with additional coats for even more extreme drama.Lip Injection Extreme: -Apply directly on clean dry lips morning and night and throughout the day as your visible lip-plumping treatment. Precautions:-You may experience a slightly intense tingle that can last up to sfive to 10 minutes. -Apply only within perimeter of lips. -If applied on skin- a temporary redness may occur.-If any discomfort is present- remove and discontinue use. -Keep away from children.
ingredients: Damn Girl- Those Lashes & Lips Set:Water\Aqua\Eau- Silica- Stearic Acid- Glyceryl Stearate- Synthetic Beeswax- Paraffin- Polyisobutene- Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer- Aminomethyl Propanediol- Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba- VP/Eicosene Copolymer- Tocopheryl Acetate- Panthenol- Pantethine- PEG-9 Dimethicone- Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer- Simethicone- PVP- 1-2-Hexanediol- Laureth-21- Hydroxyethylcellulose- Caprylyl Glycol- Isostearic Acid- Phenethyl Alcohol- Disodium EDTA- Chloroxylenol- Phenoxyethanol- Potassium Sorbate- Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Lip Injection Extreme:Mineral Oil\Paraffinum Liquidum\Huile Minerale- Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil- Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer- Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil- Tocopheryl Acetate- Ethylhexyl Palmitate- Benzyl Nicotinate- Tribehenin- Sodium Chondroitin Sulfate- Atelocollagen- Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil- Polyglyceryl-10 Tetraoleate- Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1- Silica- Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer- Tin Oxide- Silica Dimethyl Silylate- Butylene Glycol- Pentylene Glycol- Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate- Sorbitan Isostearate- Fragrance (Parfum)- Benzyl Benzoate- Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone- Capsicum Frutescens Resin- BHT- Phenoxyethanol- Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

name: Melted Chocolate Liquid Matte Eye Shadow
details: What it is: An innovative two-in-one whipped liquid eye shadow with a crease-proof formula that delivers rich- intense- chocolate-scented- matte color.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product is also cruelty-free and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: This blendable- whipped texture is waterproof and long-wearing for up to 12 hours. The two-in-one primer and shadow formula (no primer needed) is intensely pigmented- conditioning- non-drying- and has an airbrushed finish.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply directly to your eyelid with the tip of the doe-foot applicator and blend using an eye shadow brush or clean fingertip.-Wear alone or layer powder eye shadows on top to enhance pigment and shimmer payoff. -This is a quick-drying formula- so apply on one eye at a time.
